sections.heading: Sale of assets in regular course of business and mortgage of assets10-1201
sections.text: Sale of assets in regular course of business and mortgage of assetsA. On the terms and conditions and for the consideration determined by the board of directors, a corporation may:1. Sell, lease, exchange or otherwise dispose
